turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Good afternoon! This is Sarah from Maple Grove Real Estate.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Are you calling about a specific property, or would you like help finding a rental that suits your needs?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "Hi, I'm interested in the two-bedroom unit on Miller Street."

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great! The two-bedroom unit on Miller Street is definitely available. May I ask if you'd like to schedule an inspection, or do you have any specific questions about the property?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "Yes, sure. I'd like to schedule an inspection."

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect! Let's find a time that works for you.Could you let me know & r preferred day and time for inspection?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "I preferred 1pm on next Monday."

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That sounds good! I'll schedule the inspection for next Monday at 1 PM. Is there anything else I can assist you with before then?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "What documents do I need to include with my application?"

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great question! Typically, you'll need to provide proof of identity, proof of income, and references from previous landlords. I can give you a detailed list as well, if you'd like. Let me know if you have any specific questions!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "Proof of identity is Passport?"

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, absolutely! A passport is perfectly acceptable as proof of identity. If you have any other questions about th documents or the application process, fe. * ee to ask!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "Oh, thank you. I have only Japanese passport. Is it okay?"

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, that's absolutely fine! Your Japanese passport will work perfectly as proof of identity. If there's anything else you need, just let me knoW

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "Should I provide any of the documents?"

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, in addition to your passport, we typically also ask for proof of income, like recent pay stubs or an employment letter, and sometimes a reference from a previous landlord. But I can provide a detailed checklist if you'd like!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "Yes, thanks."

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, just let me know. I'm here to help

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "How do I pay for rent fee? Pay by card or pay by cash?"

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great question! Usually, we prefer payments by bank transfer or direct debit for convenience and security. However, we can also accommodate card payments. Cash payments are generally not preferred. Let me know what works best for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: "I think DirectDebit is best for me."

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That sounds perfect! We can set that up easily. I'll make sure to provide you with all the necessary details and forms for the direct debit setup. If you have any other questions or need assistance along the way, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Thank you for your service. Iâ€™ll see you at 1PM on next Monday.
